DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of health education given by nurse on out-patient compliance in cardiovascular diseases prevention and treatment.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Health Education in Cardiovascular Diseases Prevention and Treatment
DOC.criteria: first diagnosis cardiovascular disease Severe liver and kidney disease or cancer Limb movement disorder Cognitive impairment History of malignant arrhythmia or severe heart failure patients have a high risk of sudden death Diabetes Cerebrovascular disease History of atherosclerotic disease hospital
